Query: How to convert a video from mp4/flv to mpeg/mpg

Top-3 Similar Questions: au_1183076: convert all the png files in a folder to video
so_15672101: How to convert multiple files from mp4 to flv using a shell script
au_620793: Convert entire playlist from m4a to mp3
Top-3 Scripts:
au_1183076: ffmpeg -framerate 25 -i %03d.png output.avi

ffmpeg -framerate 25 -pattern_type glob -i "*.png" output.avi

cat $(find . -maxdepth 1 -name "*.png" | sort -V) | ffmpeg -framerate 25 -i - output.avi

au_620793: for f in *.flac , *.m4a , *.ogg ; do ffmpeg -i "$f" -ab 320k "${f%.m4a}.mp3"; done

do ffmpeg -i "$f" -ab 320k "${f%.flac}.mp3";

Explanations about Options.-:
Use a completely zeroed out quantization matrix. This increases PSNR but
 might reduce perception. Use in bogus benchmarks.
Explanations about Options.-framerate:
Set the grabbing frame rate. Default is "ntsc", corresponding to a frame rate of
 "30000/1001".

Answers.MP Summary: assembles multiple mpeg program streams into a suitable DVD filesystem
Top-3 Scripts:
au_1013703: dvdauthor -t -o dvd --video=pal -f output.mpg
dvdauthor -T -o dvd

Explanations about Options.-T:
Creates the table of contents file instead of a titleset. If this option is used,
 it should be listed first, and you may not specify any titles.
Explanations about Options.--video:
A plus (+) separated list of video options. Dvdauthor will try to infer any
 unspecified options. pal, ntsc, 4:3, 16:9, 720xfull, 720x576, 720x480, 704xfull,
 704x576, 704x480, 352xfull, 352x576, 352x480, 352xhalf, 352x288, 352x240,
 nopanscan, noletterbox, crop. Default is 4:3, 720xfull

Top-3 Scripts: au_355047: mencoder mf://myimage.png -o out.avi -ovc lavc -lavcopts vcodec=mjpeg -audiofile myfile.3gp -oac pcm -fps 1/187 -ofps 30

Explanations about Options.-v: Increment verbosity level, one level for each -v found on the command line.
Explanations about Options.-ofps:
Specify a frames per second (fps) value for the output file, which can be different
 from that of the source material. Must be set for variable fps (ASF, some MOV) and
 progressive (30000/1001 fps telecined MPEG) files.
Explanations about Options.-fps: Override video framerate. Useful if the original value is wrong or missing.
Explanations about Options.-audiofile: Play audio from an external file (WAV, MP3 or Ogg Vorbis) while viewing a movie.
Explanations about Options.-o:
Outputs to the given filename.
 If you want a default output filename, you can put this option in the MEncoder
 config file.
Explanations about Options.-ovc:
Encode with the given video codec (no default set).
 NOTE: Use -ovc help to get a list of available video codecs.
Explanations about Options.-oac:
Encode with the given audio codec (no default set).
 NOTE: Use -oac help to get a list of available audio codecs.
